name: LineupWiz
about: LineupWiz is a web application that helps fantasy football players to create the best lineup for their team. It is built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: Affirmation
about: Affirmation is a web application that helps users to create a list of affirmations that they can use to motivate themselves. It is built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: TaskHero
about: TaskHero is a web application that helps users to create a list of tasks that they need to complete. It is built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: Hex Generator
about: Hex generator is a web application that helps users to generate a random hex color.
